duties: Ensured rapid iterations and aggressive delivery cadence across Engineering, Product, & Design

body.team_name: Staff Engineer & Tech Lead - Effectiveness Frameworks
body.team_desc: Building backend services and software reliability frameworks as a part of the Engineering Effectiveness group at Twitter

Served as product manager and software engineer for an satellite-enabled tracking and sensor-based monitoring solution. This required building an extensible web-application that allowed customers to visualize real-time sensor data from multiple devices and analyze historical data by integrating a variety of Oracle products including Oracle Spatial Analytics, Business Intelligence, and Complex Event Processing
duties: Identification and engagement of customers and potential partner groups and account managers within Oracle
Organizing customer demos - was a speaker at Oracle Openworld 2011
Developing a real-time asset tracking and monitoring solution using wireless sensor devices

body.team_desc: Designed data-center switches and network architectures
duties: Used instruction-level application tracing and trace-driven simulations to estimate application performance

Received a patent on a novel switch design
